1369430.name: The Light of the Darkness: Renascence
1369430.description:
A WORLD REBORN

Journey through a seamless, cinematic 2.5D world in Unreal Engine 5. No loading screens. No interruptions. Fluid exploration, vertical biomes, and combat that flows in the air.

FLIGHT CHANGES EVERYTHING

Flight is freedom. Soar across layered verticality, dive into hidden depths, and battle in enemy-filled skies. The more you master flight, the more the world opens: new areas, foes, routes, and challenges only reachable to skilled flyers.

ABSORB. ADAPT. BUILD

Defeat enemies and absorb their Essences and Mystic Natures to forge distinct builds: with unique stats, weapons, and spell affinities. Swap builds to counter bosses, exploit affinities, and revisit areas with new tools and routes.

ABSORBE AND CHANGE WHO YOU ARE

RENASCENCE continues the saga introduced in ORIGINS, but your perspective here matters. The Absorption system and Memory Cabinet allow you to equip memories alongside your build, curating how the story unfolds. Canonical encounters provide the backbone of the story; limited extra slots allow you to obtain alternative memories and experience the narrative from your viewpoint.

THE MEMORY CABINET

Your mind as an inventory.

  • Canonical memories: fixed milestones that anchor the main plot.

  • Equipable memories (limited slots): choose which memories to keep to alter context, unlock powers, or reframe events.

  • Unlocking slots: special items expand capacity, letting you replace or add memories to reshape your run.

  • What you remember changes what you can do, and how you understand the world.

COMBAT EVOLVED

Tactical, stamina-driven combat meets spellcraft. Chain aerial strikes, parries, and Nature-infused spells. Elemental affinities matter: the wrong spell can heal your foe; the right one destroys it.

CONSEQUENCES THAT ENDURE

Who you fight, what you absorb, and which memories you equip ripple across exploration, encounters, and story beats. The world remembers, even when you choose to forget.

KEY FEATURES

  • Seamless 2.5D world in Unreal Engine 5

  • Flight with a fully physics-based core mechanic

  • Essence/Nature absorption shaping flexible builds

  • Memory Cabinet: curate your perspective with limited memory slots (expandable via special items)

  • Elemental affinity system: risk/reward where wrong spells can backfire

  • Next-gen visuals, cinematic presentation

  • Tactical, stamina-based combat tuned for gamepad precision
1369430.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
